title: Login button not working
description: Users cannot click the login button on homepage after UI update.

title: Navbar overlaps on mobile view
description: The top navigation bar covers half the screen on small devices.

title: Database connection timeout
description: MongoDB connection intermittently drops under heavy load.

title: Export to PDF not generating data
description: PDF file downloads empty due to backend data mismatch.

title: Search filter not updating results
description: Users report that search filter shows outdated items until refresh.

title: Add dark mode toggle
description: Provide a button to switch between light and dark themes.

title: Incorrect effort calculation in dashboard
description: Dashboard shows total efforts as a sum of wrong fields.

title: API returns 500 on POST /issues
description: Validation missing for description field causing server crash.

title: Enhance table UI with soft cards
description: Replace basic table with modern card-based layout.

title: Fix duplicate entries on refresh
description: Frontend adds duplicate issues after page reload due to missing key.

title: Button hover animations missing
description: Some buttons have inconsistent hover styles after redesign.

title: Improve backend error messages
description: Standardize error structure for client-side use.

title: Implement priority levels
description: Add Low/Medium/High priority field for issues.

title: API rate limiting
description: Prevent abuse by adding request rate limits in backend.

title: Add user authentication
description: Add signup/login to restrict access to issue tracker.

title: Sorting does not persist on refresh
description: Frontend resets sorting to default after refreshing the page.

title: Add comment system inside issue
description: Allow developers to add comments under each issue.

title: Allow multiple assignees per issue
description: Add support for assigning more than one team member.

title: Fix slow initial load time
description: Optimize backend query to avoid delay on first load.

title: Update documentation
description: Improve README with backend and database setup instructions.
